net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

Class Game

  • Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    A class representing a chess game. It can parse PGN strings and moves in both FEN and SAN format. It also allows for playing and unplaying moves while keeping track of the state of the game.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Position position,
            String event,
            String site,
            String whitePlayerName,
            String blackPlayerName,
            int round)
        Parameters:
        position - The start position of the game.
        event - The name of the event.
        site - The site of the event.
        whitePlayerName - The white player's name.
        blackPlayerName - The black player's name.
        round - The round number in case the game is one of a series of games.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static Game parse(String pgn)
                  throws ChessParseException
        Parses a game in PGN notation and returns a game instance.
        Parameters:
        pgn - The PGN string.
        Returns:
        The game instance.
        Throws:
        ChessParseException - If the PGN string cannot be parsed.

      • getStartPos

        public Position getStartPos()
        Returns:
        A deep copy of the starting position of the game.

        public Position getPosition()
        Returns:
        A deep copy of the current position

      • getEvent

        public String getEvent()
        Returns:
        The name of the event the game took place at.

      • getSite

        public String getSite()
        Returns:
        The site of the event where the game took place.

      • isWhitesTurn

        public boolean isWhitesTurn()
        Returns:
        Whether it is white's turn to make a move.

      • setEvent

        public void setEvent(String event)
        Parameters:
        event - The name of the event at which the game took place.

      • setSite

        public void setSite(String site)

      • setBlackPlayerName

        public void setBlackPlayerName(String blackPlayerName)
        Parameters:
        blackPlayerName - The name of the black player.

      • setState

        public void setState(GameState state)
        Sets the state of the game in case of draw by agreement, resignation, or time out. Otherwise it is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        state - The new state of the game.

      • play

        public boolean play(String move)
        Plays a move defined either in PACN or SAN format if legal.
        Parameters:
        move - The move to make defined either in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation or Standard Algebraic Notation.
        Returns:
        Whether the move was legal and of valid format.

      • unplay

        public String unplay()
        Unmakes the last move and returns it in Pure Algebraic Coordinate Notation. It returns null if no moves have been made yet.
        Returns:
        The last move PACN format.

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
